thread.title: BRIEF-City Office REIT Announces New $250 Mln Unsecured Credit Facility

title: BRIEF-City Office REIT Announces New $250 Mln Unsecured Credit Facility
text: March 19, 2018 / 8:33 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-City Office REIT Announces New $250 Mln Unsecured Credit Facility Reuters Staff March 19 (Reuters) - City Office Reit Inc: * CITY OFFICE REIT ANNOUNCES NEW $250 MILLION UNSECURED CREDIT FACILITY * CITY OFFICE REIT INC - REPLACED ITS EXISTING SECURED REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY WITH A NEW UNSECURED REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY * CITY OFFICE REIT - UNSECURED CREDIT FACILITY INCREASES COMPANYâ€™S BORROWING CAPACITY TO $250 MILLION * CITY OFFICE REIT - UNSECURED CREDIT FACILITY CONTAINS ACCORDION FEATURE ALLOWING FOR POTENTIAL BORROWING CAPACITY OF UP TO $500 MILLION * CITY OFFICE REIT INC - UNSECURED CREDIT FACILITY HAS A MATURITY DATE OF MARCH 2022 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
